name: Blue II
description:
This game was made for the #TeamKentucky game jam, hosted by Louisville Makes Games, with a theme of "social distancing".

I was inspired by Joan Miró, in particular his "Blue" paintings.

Read this excerpt from an interview with Joan Miró by Yvon Taillandier in 1958:

The spectacle of the sky overwhelms me.  I'm overwhelmed when I see, in an immense sky, the crescent of the moon or the sun.  There are, in my pictures, tiny forms in huge empty spaces.  Empty spaces, empty horizons, empty plains--everything bare has always greatly impressed me."

Use the arrow keys to move.

This game is a work in progress.
